sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import './PcCard.css' const PcCard = ({ charName, playerName, concept, image, attributes }) => { const showAttributeEmojis = (att, emoji) => { let display = '' for (let i = 0; i < att; i++) { display += emoji } return display } const displayHealthBar = (att) => { let red = '' let yellow = '' let green = '' for (let i = 0; i < att; i++) { red += '🟥' yellow += '🟨' green += '🟩' } return red + yellow + green } return(

{charName}

{image}

{concept}

played by: {playerName}

Attributes
Brawn:
{showAttributeEmojis(attributes.brawn, '💪')}
Agility:
{showAttributeEmojis(attributes.agility, '👟')}
Smarts:
{showAttributeEmojis(attributes.intellegence, '🧠')}
Wit:
{showAttributeEmojis(attributes.wit, '⚡️')}
Charm:
{showAttributeEmojis(attributes.charm, '✨')}
Presence:
{showAttributeEmojis(attributes.presence, '👤')}
Vitals
Status: Healthy
🟥🟥🟥🟥🟧🟧🟧🟧🟩🟩🟩🟩
⚠️
{/*
Initiative determines your turn order in battle. Your Presence and Agility on the battlefield
*/}
👟
{/*
Dodge lets you avoid damage.
*/}
⏩
{/*
Drive gives you an extra card to spend per point spent.
*/}
♥️
{/*
On flipping the Queen of Hearts, Crit gives you successes equal to your Charm stat.
*/}
🚫
{/*
When Jokers and Anti-Jokers meet, they obliterate each other. Use wisely to avoid the chaotic effects of flipping a Joker.
*/}
) } export default PcCard
